name: What Romaines of Kolonel Korn
description:
Explore the remnants of a farm overrun by the undead remains of the farm hands who were brutally forced to work until they dropped and were eventually formed with the very crops they were made to grow.

================================

You awake to a disturbing sound in the distance. A deep fog surrounds you, along with some overturned tractors. In front of you, you can faintly make out a barn. The sounds get noticeably louder, and as you turn you see a disturbing sight. Dozens of abhorrent creatures, reminiscent of people, with vegetables growing out of their eyes lunge at you.  Your memory starts to return to you, this is your farm, and these are the very men who you forced to slave away for you until death, and now they're coming back for revenge.  With a trusty pistol nearby you run for cover and await the incoming horde.

What Romaines of Kolonel Korn is a wave-based zombie shooter. Players will have to use their guns, defeat zombies for points, buy doors, and explore their environment for additional supplies. Use your tools to survive, or die trying. 


================================ Singleplayer Install Instructions:

1. Hit the Download button below for the singleplayer version

2. Unzip the downloaded file

3. Read "readme" 

4. Open the .exe application file 

5. Enjoy!

*Multiplayer version coming soon*
